Desc.entry: A social enterprise aimed at providing mentoring programmes for people affected by learning difficulties, mental health difficulties, physical disabilities, children with autism, obesity, NEETS (young people Not in Education, Employment or Training) and young offenders. By using Social Engagement Through Snooker (SETS) the academy helps to enable disadvantaged groups and individuals to participate in sport and improve their quality of life. SETS includes a mentoring programme and offers a 10-step learning certificate promoting numeracy and literacy skills, concentration, organisational skills, sportsmanship, team building, social skills, life skills and exercise.
